notes: USA-based bulk supplier of Plant Oil Squalane Olive (conventional and organic options) for cosmetics, soap, candle, apothecary, food and dietary supplements. Applications: Hydrating skincare (10-30%), hair care (2-5%), multi-purpose applications. Conventional and organic options available, olive-derived. Bulk wholesale pricing ($40-65/kg for bulk orders) with bulk quantities (gallons, drums). Samples available for bulk customers. Organic options and cosmetic grade certified. USA-based bulk distribution. Bulk order support and product specifications available. Ideal for diverse applications and bulk production.
